name: Gemini 2.5 Flash Preview (May 20)
description: May 2025 preview of Gemini 2.5 Flash - the first Flash model with hybrid reasoning capabilities. Allows developers to control thinking on/off and set thinking budgets for optimal balance of quality, cost, and latency.
notes: Preview model released May 20, 2025 at Google I/O. First Flash model with thinking capabilities. Improved across reasoning, multimodality, code, and long context while using 20-30% fewer tokens. Pricing: $0.30/1M input, $2.50/1M output (non-thinking), $3.50/1M thinking output. Audio input: $1.00/1M tokens. This preview became the stable gemini-2.5-flash release with no changes.
